scripts.preinstall: if [ "$SKIP_PREINSTALL" != "true" ]; then node -e "if(process.env.npm_execpath.indexOf('pnpm') === -1) throw new Error('You must use pnpm to install dependencies')"; else echo 'Skipping preinstall script'; fi
scripts.build: pnpm rm-dist && pnpm rm-types && cross-env APP_ENV=staging LIB_ENV=staging rollup -c rollup.config.js && pnpm generate-declarations
scripts.build:visualizer: pnpm rm-dist && pnpm rm-types && cross-env APP_ENV=staging LIB_ENV=staging INCLUDE_VISUALIZER=true rollup -c rollup.config.js && pnpm generate-declarations
scripts.build:buildStats: pnpm rm-dist && pnpm rm-types && cross-env APP_ENV=staging LIB_ENV=staging INCLUDE_BUILD_STATS=true rollup -c rollup.config.js && pnpm generate-declarations
scripts.build:visualizer:buildStats: pnpm rm-dist && pnpm rm-types && cross-env APP_ENV=staging LIB_ENV=staging INCLUDE_VISUALIZER=true INCLUDE_BUILD_STATS=true rollup -c rollup.config.js && pnpm generate-declarations
scripts.build:beta: pnpm rm-dist && pnpm rm-types && cross-env APP_ENV=staging LIB_ENV=beta rollup -c rollup.config.js && pnpm generate-declarations
scripts.build:beta:visualizer: pnpm rm-dist && pnpm rm-types && cross-env APP_ENV=staging LIB_ENV=beta INCLUDE_VISUALIZER=true rollup -c rollup.config.js && pnpm generate-declarations
scripts.build:beta:buildStats: pnpm rm-dist && pnpm rm-types && cross-env APP_ENV=staging LIB_ENV=beta INCLUDE_BUILD_STATS=true rollup -c rollup.config.js && pnpm generate-declarations
scripts.build:beta:visualizer:buildStats: pnpm rm-dist && pnpm rm-types && cross-env APP_ENV=staging LIB_ENV=beta INCLUDE_VISUALIZER=true INCLUDE_BUILD_STATS=true rollup -c rollup.config.js && pnpm generate-declarations
scripts.build:prod: pnpm rm-dist && pnpm rm-types && cross-env APP_ENV=staging LIB_ENV=production rollup -c rollup.config.js && pnpm generate-declarations
scripts.build:prod:visualizer: pnpm rm-dist && pnpm rm-types && cross-env APP_ENV=staging LIB_ENV=production INCLUDE_VISUALIZER=true rollup -c rollup.config.js && pnpm generate-declarations
scripts.build:prod:buildStats: pnpm rm-dist && pnpm rm-types && cross-env APP_ENV=staging LIB_ENV=production INCLUDE_BUILD_STATS=true rollup -c rollup.config.js && pnpm generate-declarations
scripts.build:prod:visualizer:buildStats: pnpm rm-dist && pnpm rm-types && cross-env APP_ENV=staging LIB_ENV=production INCLUDE_VISUALIZER=true INCLUDE_BUILD_STATS=true rollup -c rollup.config.js && pnpm generate-declarations
scripts.publish:release: npm publish --no-git-checks && gh release create v-build-modules-$npm_package_version --verify-tag --title "Release v-build-modules-$npm_package_version" --notes "Release v-build-modules-$npm_package_version"
scripts.publish:alpha: npm publish --no-git-checks --tag alpha && gh release create v-build-modules-$npm_package_version --verify-tag --prerelease --title "Release v-build-modules-$npm_package_version (alpha)" --notes "Release v-build-modules-$npm_package_version (alpha)"
scripts.publish:beta: npm publish --no-git-checks --tag beta && gh release create v-build-modules-$npm_package_version --verify-tag --prerelease --title "Release v-build-modules-$npm_package_version (beta)" --notes "Release v-build-modules-$npm_package_version (beta)"
scripts.publish:rc: npm publish --no-git-checks --tag rc && gh release create v-build-modules-$npm_package_version --verify-tag --prerelease --title "Release v-build-modules-$npm_package_version (rc)" --notes "Release v-build-modules-$npm_package_version (rc)"
